author: szetszwo
msg: svn merge -c 1428739 from trunk for HDFS-4270. Introduce soft and hard limits for max replication so that replications of the highest priority are allowed to choose a source datanode that has reached its soft limit but not the hard limit.

msg: OWB-745: made AnnotatedType required for OwbBean

author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-4270. Introduce soft and hard limits for max replication so that replications of the highest priority are allowed to choose a source datanode that has reached its soft limit but not the hard limit.  Contributed by Derek Dagit
